#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int a[10][2]={{1,0},{1,1},{8,6},{4,1},{2,6},{1,5},{1,6},{4,1},{4,6},{2,1}};

int main()
{
    int num=0;
  int  sum=0;
 // int n='#';
  //cout<<n;
  scanf("%d",&num);
  
  //system("pause");
    while(num!=0)
    {
        
        for(int i=1;i<=num;i++)
        {
            
            if(i>=4)
            {
                sum=sum+a[i%10][1];
                sum=sum%10;
            }
            else
            {
                if(i==1)
                {
                    sum=sum+1;
                    sum=sum%10;
                    continue;
                }    
                if(i==2)
                {
                    sum=sum+4;
                    sum=sum%10;
                    continue;
                }    
                if(i==3)
                {
                    sum=sum+9;
                    sum=sum%10;
                    continue;
                }    
            }        
            
            
            
        }    
        
          printf("%d\n",sum);
          sum=0;
          num=0;
        scanf("%d",&num);
        
    }    
    
  
  //  system("pause");
    
}
